name: Authenticated Experience Bug Template
about: Basic template for creating Authenticated Experience bugs
title: Product | Issue Name
labels: authenticated-experience, my-va-dashboard, needs-refinement, profile
assignees: ''
type: Bug

---

## Background Information
### Describe the bug details.


### How do you reproduce this issue?


### Are there any dependencies?


### What is the impact of this issue?


### What open questions do you have?


## Urgency - How severe is the problem?
- [ ] Critical - extensive/widespread, impacts all users, direct impact to healthcare and fincancials
- [ ] High - several to most users affected, risk to healthcare and financials
- [ ] Moderate - few to several users affected, no impact to healthcare or financials
- [ ] Low - localized, single user affected, no impact to healthcare and financials and not time-sensitive
  
## Desired Behavior - how should the site function or work?


## Tasks
_Consider:_
- Which team(s) to partner with to resolve the issue
- Which communication medium will be used to ensure all parties are updated 
- Respond as timely as possible to keep communications moving if working with a partner team on a resolution
- If critical or high priority, is an OOB deployment required? If so, notify VA PO ASAP and prepare to complete a [postmortem](https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/va.gov-team-sensitive/tree/master/Postmortems).

## Acceptance Critieria - fix in place
- [ ] This issue is complete when


## Definition of Done - this issue is ready to close when:
- [ ] Passed all testing coverage
- [ ] Logging & monitoring are in place
- [ ] Code has been reviewed by all parties, merged, and validated
